setting.msg-restart-required.english: Changing this option requires a restart to take effect.
setting.msg-restart-required.chinese: 此选项更改需重启后方可生效。

setting.editor.spellcheck-languages-desc.english: Choose the languages for the spellchecker to use.
setting.editor.spellcheck-languages-desc.chinese: 选择需要检查拼写的语言。

setting.editor.spellcheck-languages-mac-.english: The native spellchecker will automatically detect the language being used for you on macOS.
setting.editor.spellcheck-languages-mac-.chinese: 本地的拼写检查器将自动检测你当前所使用的语言。

setting.editor.option-show-inline-title-.english: Displays the filename as an editable title inline with the file contents.
setting.editor.option-show-inline-title-.chinese: 在笔记页面内显示笔记标题。

setting.editor.option-readable-line-desc.english: Limit maximum line length. Less content fits onscreen, but long blocks of text are more readable.
setting.editor.option-readable-line-desc.chinese: 开启后将限制每行字数，使屏幕显示的内容减少，但使较长的段落更具可读性。

setting.editor.option-strict-line-break-.english: Markdown specs ignore single line breaks in reading view. Turn this off to make single line breaks visible.
setting.editor.option-strict-line-break-.chinese: 开启后，根据 Markdown 标准，单个换行符在预览模式下不再生效。

setting.editor.option-properties-in-docu.english: Choose how properties are displayed at the top of notes. Select “source” to show properties as raw YAML.
setting.editor.option-properties-in-docu.chinese: 选择笔记属性在编辑器中的显示方式。选择 "源码" 可以以 YAML 格式显示笔记属性。

setting.editor.option-auto-pair-brackets.chinese: 自动补全英文标点符号
自动补全英文括号和引号。

setting.editor.option-auto-pair-markdown.chinese: 自动补全 Markdown 语法

setting.editor.option-auto-pair-markdown.english: Pair symbols automatically for bold, italic, code, and more.
setting.editor.option-auto-pair-markdown.chinese: 自动补全表示粗体和斜体的标记。

setting.editor.option-smart-indent-lists.english: Automatically set indentation and place list items correctly.
setting.editor.option-smart-indent-lists.chinese: 开启后 Obsidian 将根据换行和缩进情况自动调整列表符号。

setting.editor.option-fold-heading-descr.english: Lets you fold all content under a heading.
setting.editor.option-fold-heading-descr.chinese: 开启后可以将正文内容折叠到标题行。

setting.editor.option-fold-indent-descri.english: Lets you fold part of an indentation, such as lists.
setting.editor.option-fold-indent-descri.chinese: 开启后可以将缩进内容（如列表）折叠起来。

setting.editor.option-default-new-tab-vi.english: The default view that a new Markdown tab gets opened in.
setting.editor.option-default-new-tab-vi.chinese: 设置新标签页的默认视图模式。

setting.editor.option-open-tab-in-foregr.english: When you open a link in a new tab, switch to it immediately.
setting.editor.option-open-tab-in-foregr.chinese: 当你在新标签页打开链接，立即切换至新标签页。

setting.editor.option-default-editing-mo.english: The default editing mode a new tab will start with.
setting.editor.option-default-editing-mo.chinese: 在编辑视图下，新标签页默认采用的编辑模式。

setting.editor.option-show-line-number-d.english: Show line numbers in the gutter.

setting.editor.option-indentation-guide-.english: Show vertical relationship lines between list items.
setting.editor.option-indentation-guide-.chinese: 在缩进的行之间显示参考线。

setting.editor.option-use-tabs-descripti.english: Use tabs to indent by pressing the “Tab” key. Turn this off to indent using 4 spaces.
setting.editor.option-use-tabs-descripti.chinese: 开启后，Tab 键将使用制表符来完成缩进。关闭后 Tab 键将使用空格完成缩进。

setting.editor.option-tab-size-descripti.english: Number of spaces a tab character will render as.
setting.editor.option-tab-size-descripti.chinese: 设置制表符等同的空格数。

setting.editor.option-rtl-description.english: Sets the default text direction of notes to right-to-left.
setting.editor.option-rtl-description.chinese: 将文本的默认水平对齐方式修改为右对齐。

setting.editor.option-auto-convert-html-.english: Automatically convert HTML to Markdown when pasting and drag-and-drop from web pages. Use Ctrl/Cmd+Shift+V to paste HTML without converting.
setting.editor.option-auto-convert-html-.chinese: 从网页粘贴或拖拽粘贴内容时自动将 HTML 格式转换为 Markdown 格式。如果不想转换，请使用 Ctrl/Cmd+Shift+V 进行粘贴。

setting.editor.option-vim-key-bindings-d.english: Use Vim key bindings when editing.
setting.editor.option-vim-key-bindings-d.chinese: 允许在编辑器中使用 Vim 模式。

setting.editor.option-vim-key-bindings-m.english: On mobile devices, this setting is per-device and is not synchronized through the config file.
setting.editor.option-vim-key-bindings-m.chinese: 在移动设备上，该设置需要单独开启，且开启状态不会同步到其他移动设备上。

setting.editor.option-reindex-vault-desc.english: Rebuilding the cache could take a few seconds to a few minutes depending on the size of your vault.
setting.editor.option-reindex-vault-desc.chinese: 重建缓存可能需要几秒钟到几分钟的时间，具体取决于您的仓库大小。

setting.editor.label-confirm-enable-vim.chinese: 确认进入 Vim 模式

setting.editor.label-vim-warning.english: Vim mode is for efficient text editing but can be quite counter-intuitive. If you're not familiar with Vim, this option might make it look like Obsidian has stopped working.
setting.editor.label-vim-warning.chinese: Vim 模式可以实现高效的文本编辑操作，但其使用方法十分复杂。如果你对 Vim 不了解，开启该模式可能会让 Obsidian 难以使用。

setting.editor.label-vim-test.english: To verify that you know your way around Vim, please enter the command to quit Vim without saving below:
setting.editor.label-vim-test.chinese: 为了确保你知道如何使用 Vim，请输入 Vim 中“退出而不保存”对应的命令：

setting.editor.msg-vim-mode-enabled.english: Command is correct. Vim mode now enabled.
setting.editor.msg-vim-mode-enabled.chinese: 命令正确。开启 Vim 模式。

setting.editor.msg-vim-mode-not-enabled.english: Command is incorrect. Vim mode remains disabled to protect you.
setting.editor.msg-vim-mode-not-enabled.chinese: 命令错误。为保证你的使用体验，暂不开启 Vim 模式。

setting.editor.msg-vim-mode-please-enter.english: Please enter the command to enable Vim mode
setting.editor.msg-vim-mode-please-enter.chinese: 请输入相应命令开启 Vim 模式。

setting.file.option-confirm-file-deletio.chinese: 是否需要弹出提示窗口以确认删除文件。

setting.file.option-delete-destination-d.english: What happens to a file after you delete it.
setting.file.option-delete-destination-d.chinese: 要如何处理已删除的文件？

setting.file.option-choice-vault-trash.chinese: 移至软件回收站（.trash 文件夹）

setting.file.option-always-update-links-.english: Turn off to be prompted to update links after renaming a file.
setting.file.option-always-update-links-.chinese: 开启后重命名文件时 Obsidian 会自动为你更新内部链接，关闭后则需要你手动确认是否更新。

setting.file.option-new-note-location-de.english: Where newly created notes are placed. Plugin settings will override this.
setting.file.option-new-note-location-de.chinese: 指定新建笔记的存放路径，插件可能会修改此设置。

setting.file.option-choice-current-folde.chinese: 当前文件所在的文件夹

setting.file.option-new-file-folder-path.english: Folder to create new notes in
setting.file.option-new-file-folder-path.chinese: 存放新建笔记的文件夹

setting.file.option-new-file-folder-path.english: Newly created notes will appear under this folder. Plugin settings will override this.
setting.file.option-new-file-folder-path.chinese: 指定存放新笔记的文件夹，插件可能会修改此设置。

setting.file.option-use-wiki-links-descr.english: Auto-generate Wikilinks for [[links]] and ![[images]] instead of Markdown links and images. Disable this option to generate Markdown links instead.
setting.file.option-use-wiki-links-descr.chinese: 开启后，在笔记中链接其他笔记或图像时，使用如 [[文件名]] 和 ![[图片名]] 这样的Wiki链接。关闭此选项则默认使用标准的 Markdown 超链接语法，如 []()。

setting.file.option-show-unsupported-fil.english: Show files with any extension even if Obsidian can't open them natively, so that you can link to them and see them in File Explorer and Quick Switcher.
setting.file.option-show-unsupported-fil.chinese: 在文件列表和快速切换中显示所有类型的文件，即使是那些目前 Obsidian 不支持的类型。开启此选项后可以对不支持的文件进行链接。

setting.file.option-link-autocompleted-f.english: What links to insert when auto-generating internal links.
setting.file.option-link-autocompleted-f.chinese: 设置在笔记中链接其他文件时插入 "[[ ]]" 中的文件路径类型。

setting.file.option-choice-relative-path.chinese: 基于当前笔记的相对路径

setting.file.option-choice-absolute-path.chinese: 基于仓库根目录的绝对路径

setting.file.option-new-attachment-locat.english: Where newly added attachments are placed.
setting.file.option-new-attachment-locat.chinese: 设置新添加附件的存放位置。

setting.file.option-choice-subdirectory.chinese: 当前文件所在文件夹下指定的子文件夹

setting.file.option-attachment-folder-pa.english: Place newly created attachment files, such as images created via drag-and-drop or audio recordings, in this folder.
setting.file.option-attachment-folder-pa.chinese: 指定用于存放附件的文件夹。新建的附件会存放于此，如音频记录或通过拖放或粘贴创建的图像等。

setting.file.option-attachment-subfolder.english: If your file is under “vault/folder”, and you set subfolder name to “attachments”, attachments will be saved to “vault/folder/attachments”.
setting.file.option-attachment-subfolder.chinese: 如果当前文件在 "vault/folder" 中，而设置子文件夹名称为 "attachments"，则附件将被保存至 "vault/folder/attachments" 路径下。

setting.file.option-excluded-files-desc.english: Excluded files will be hidden in Search, Graph View, and Unlinked Mentions, less noticeable in Quick Switcher and link suggestions.
setting.file.option-excluded-files-desc.chinese: 符合以下条件的文件将被忽略。忽略是指文件将出现在快速切换、链接补全中队列的末尾，以及不在关系图谱和搜索结果中出现。

setting.file.label-no-excluded-filters-a.english: No excluded filter is applied right now. Add one below.
setting.file.label-no-excluded-filters-a.chinese: 目前没有需要忽略的文件。可以在下方添加需要忽略的文件。

setting.file.label-excluded-filters-appl.english: Files matching the following filters are currently excluded:
setting.file.label-excluded-filters-appl.chinese: 符合下方条件的文件将被忽略：

setting.file.placeholder-excluded-filter.chinese: 请输入文件路径或如 "/regex/" 这样的正则表达式

setting.file.option-uri-callbacks-desc.english: Enable the use of x-callback-url through x-success or x-error when handling Obsidian URIs.
setting.file.option-uri-callbacks-desc.chinese: 在处理 Obsidian 的 URI 时，允许通过 x-success 或 x-error 参数使用 x-callback-url 功能。

setting.appearance.option-base-theme-des.chinese: 设置 Obsidian 的基础颜色。

setting.appearance.option-accent-color-d.english: Choose the accent color used throughout the app.
setting.appearance.option-accent-color-d.chinese: 为 Obsidian 选择一个主题色。主题色将影响选中、链接等元素的颜色。

setting.appearance.option-interface-font.english: Set base font for all of Obsidian.
setting.appearance.option-interface-font.chinese: 设置 Obsidian 界面字体。在不指定其他字体的情况下，该字体将成为 Obsidian 的基础字体。

setting.appearance.option-zoom-level-des.english: Controls the overall zoom level of the app.
setting.appearance.option-zoom-level-des.chinese: 控制应用程序的整体缩放比例

setting.appearance.option-text-font-desc.english: Set font for editing and reading views.
setting.appearance.option-text-font-desc.chinese: 设置编辑视图和阅读视图中笔记正文的字体。

setting.appearance.option-monospace-font.english: Set font for places like code blocks and frontmatter.
setting.appearance.option-monospace-font.chinese: 设置代码块、frontmatter 等代码的字体。

setting.appearance.label-multiple-fonts-.english: The following fonts are currently applied:

setting.appearance.label-no-custom-font-.english: No custom font is applied right now. Add one below.
setting.appearance.label-no-custom-font-.chinese: 当前未指定自定义字体。请在下方添加一个。

setting.appearance.label-font-applied.english: The first font from this list that is available on your system will be applied.
setting.appearance.label-font-applied.chinese: 列表中第一种字体将被应用。若该字体不存在于当前设备上，则顺延至存在于当前设备上的字体。

setting.appearance.msg-font-not-found.english: This font is not detected on your system.

setting.appearance.msg-font-found.english: This font is detected on your system.

setting.appearance.option-community-them.english: Preview and use amazing themes created by the community.
setting.appearance.option-community-them.chinese: 预览、使用社区用户创建的优秀主题。

setting.appearance.option-font-size-desc.english: Font size in pixels that affects editing and reading views.
setting.appearance.option-font-size-desc.chinese: 调整编辑视图及预览视图中的字体大小（单位为像素）。

setting.appearance.option-font-size-acti.english: Adjust the font size using Ctrl + Scroll, or using the trackpad pinch-zoom gesture.
setting.appearance.option-font-size-acti.chinese: 开启后可通过 Ctrl 与鼠标滚轮（或使用触摸板手势）快速调整字体大小。

setting.appearance.option-manage-themes-.english: Manage installed themes and browse community themes.
setting.appearance.option-manage-themes-.chinese: 管理已安装的主题，或浏览社区主题。

setting.appearance.option-native-menus-d.english: Menus throughout the app will match the operating system. They will not be affected by your theme.
setting.appearance.option-native-menus-d.chinese: Obsidian 中所有的菜单都会匹配操作系统，不会跟随主题样式

setting.appearance.label-no-css-snippets.chinese: 没有在代码片段文件夹中发现 CSS 代码片段。

setting.appearance.no-snippet-descriptio.chinese: CSS 代码片段的存放路径为："{{path}}"。

setting.appearance.msg-reloaded-snippets.chinese: 重新加载 CSS 代码片段

setting.appearance.option-toggle-snippet.chinese: 应用当前代码片段。该代码片段的存放路径为："{{path}}"。

setting.appearance.option-frame-descript.english: Determines the styling of the title bar of Obsidian windows. Requires a full restart to take effect.
setting.appearance.option-frame-descript.chinese: 更改 Obsidian 窗口边框的样式。该设置重启应用后生效。

setting.appearance.option-custom-icon-de.english: Set a custom icon for the app
setting.appearance.option-custom-icon-de.chinese: 给应用设置一个自定义的图标

setting.appearance.option-configure-ribb.english: Configure what commands appear in the ribbon menu.
setting.appearance.option-configure-ribb.chinese: 设置哪些命令需要显示在功能区上。

setting.appearance.option-mobile-quick-r.english: Choose the behavior of tapping the ribbon button in the navigation menu. By default, this will open a menu showing all your ribbon items.
setting.appearance.option-mobile-quick-r.chinese: 点击底部导航栏上的按钮将激活对应功能。长按按钮将激活功能区。

setting.appearance.option-show-ribbon-de.english: Display vertical toolbar on the side of the window.
setting.appearance.option-show-ribbon-de.chinese: 显示窗口最左侧的功能区，以便快速执行命令。

setting.appearance.label-modal-configura.english: Choose what items you want to be active in the ribbon. Drag and drop to change the order.
setting.appearance.label-modal-configura.chinese: 选择需要在功能区中显示的命令。拖动可以重新排序。

setting.appearance.option-show-view-head.english: Display the header at the top of every tab.
setting.appearance.option-show-view-head.chinese: 在每个标签页上方显示标题栏。

setting.appearance.msg-updates-found.chinese: 有 {{count}} 个社区主题需要更新。

setting.appearance.msg-updates-found_plu.chinese: 有 {{count}} 个社区主题需要更新。

setting.appearance.label-currently-insta.chinese: 你目前已经安装了 {{count}} 个主题
你目前安装了 {{count}} 个主题

setting.hotkeys.tooltip-hotkey-multiple-.english: This hotkey conflicts with {{count}} other commands
setting.hotkeys.tooltip-hotkey-multiple-.chinese: 该快捷键与其他 {{count}} 个快捷键冲突

setting.about.label-manual-update-requir.english: To support the latest features and to receive the latest security patches, Obsidian needs a major installer update. You need to manually download and reinstall Obsidian.
setting.about.label-manual-update-requir.chinese: Obsidian 需要进行一次较大的更新来获取最新功能和安全补丁。为此，你需要手动下载安装包并重新安装 Obsidian。

setting.about.label-new-version-ready.english: A new version is ready to be installed.

setting.about.option-auto-update-descrip.english: Turn this off to prevent the app from checking for updates.
setting.about.option-auto-update-descrip.chinese: 关闭后 Obsidian 将不会自动更新。

setting.about.option-check-slow-startup.english: Notify if startup takes longer than expected
setting.about.option-check-slow-startup.chinese: 应用启动缓慢时进行通知

setting.about.option-check-slow-startup-.english: Diagnose issues with your app by seeing what is causing the app to load slowly.
setting.about.option-check-slow-startup-.chinese: 通过查看导致应用加载缓慢的原因来诊断问题。

setting.about.option-get-help-descriptio.english: Learn how to use Obsidian and get help from the community.
setting.about.option-get-help-descriptio.chinese: 获取关于使用 Obsidian 的帮助。

setting.about.option-insider-build-descr.english: Auto-update to the latest early access version. These versions include new features but may be less stable.
setting.about.option-insider-build-descr.chinese: 自动更新至内部版本以体验最新功能。请注意，内部版本可能不太稳定。

setting.about.option-hw-acceleration-des.english: Turns on Hardware Acceleration, which uses your GPU to make Obsidian smoother.
setting.about.option-hw-acceleration-des.chinese: 开启硬件加速，即使用 GPU 让 Obsidian 运行更流畅。

setting.about.option-hw-acceleration-war.english: If you turn this off, app performance will be severely degraded.
setting.about.option-hw-acceleration-war.chinese: 如果关闭此选项，Obsidian 的性能将严重下降。

setting.about.option-config-location-des.english: Use a different config folder than the default one. Must start with a dot.
setting.about.option-config-location-des.chinese: 选用另一个设置文件夹而非默认设置文件夹。设置文件夹名称一定要以句点"."开头。

setting.about.option-config-location-war.english: Config location must be a valid folder name that starts with a dot.
setting.about.option-config-location-war.chinese: 设置文件夹路径必须是合法的，并且以句点"."开头。

setting.about.label-commercial-license-i.english: Registered to “{{company}}” for {{seats}} users. Valid until {{expiry}}.

setting.about.option-catalyst-desc.english: You currently have the {{tier}} Catalyst license. Thanks for your support!
setting.about.option-catalyst-desc.chinese: 你已成为 {{tier}}，感谢对 Obsidian 的支持！

setting.about.option-catalyst-desc-no-li.english: You don't have a Catalyst license. Catalyst is a one-time donation that helps Obsidian remain 100% user-supported and gives you early access to new features.
setting.about.option-catalyst-desc-no-li.chinese: 你尚未购买 Catalyst 个人许可证。Catalyst 个人许可证是一种支持 Obsidian 开发的捐赠形式。

setting.about.label-add-own-language.english: Learn how to add a new language to Obsidian.
setting.about.label-add-own-language.chinese: 显示如何给 Obsidian 添加你的母语

setting.account.option-your-account-desc.english: You're not logged in right now. An account is only needed for Obsidian Sync, Obsidian Publish, and early access versions.
setting.account.option-your-account-desc.chinese: 你没有登录。使用 Obsidian 同步服务、发布服务以及获取内部版本都需要你登录账号。

setting.account.message-login-failed.english: Login failed, please double check your email and password.
setting.account.message-login-failed.chinese: 登录失败，请检查你的邮箱和密码。

setting.account.mfa-wrong-format.english: The 2FA authenticator code must be 6 digits.

setting.account.mfa-verification-failed.english: 2FA code is incorrect, please double check your authenticator app.
setting.account.mfa-verification-failed.chinese: 2FA 验证码不正确，请再次检查你的验证器应用。

setting.core-plugin.option-search-plugin.english: Filter plugins by name or description.
setting.core-plugin.option-search-plugin.chinese: 通过插件名称或描述来寻找插件。

setting.third-party-plugin.option-restri.english: Restricted mode is off. Turn on to disable community plugins.
setting.third-party-plugin.option-restri.chinese: 安全模式已关闭。开启以限制第三方插件运行。

setting.third-party-plugin.option-browse.english: Browse and install community plugins made by our amazing community.
setting.third-party-plugin.option-browse.chinese: 浏览、安装社区成员制作的第三方插件。

setting.third-party-plugin.label-exit-re.english: Community plugins, like any other software you install, could potentially cause data integrity and security issues.
setting.third-party-plugin.label-exit-re.chinese: 和你在电脑上安装的其他软件一样，第三方插件也可能会带来数据和隐私风险。

setting.third-party-plugin.label-exit-re.english: Plugin security is important to us. Here's what we do:
setting.third-party-plugin.label-exit-re.chinese: 我们非常重视你的数据安全，所以我们采取了如下做法：

setting.third-party-plugin.label-exit-re.english: Despite our efforts, there is still a small chance that a community plugin might misbehave.
setting.third-party-plugin.label-exit-re.chinese: 但即便如此，市场中的插件仍有出错的可能。

setting.third-party-plugin.label-code-re.english: Plugins in the official community directory undergo an initial code review by our team before they are listed.
setting.third-party-plugin.label-code-re.chinese: 插件在上架社区插件市场前需要经过我们的代码审查。

setting.third-party-plugin.label-open-so.english: Most plugins are open source on GitHub, so you can inspect the code yourself.
setting.third-party-plugin.label-open-so.chinese: 大多数插件都在 GitHub 上开源，这允许你对插件代码进行审查。

setting.third-party-plugin.label-peer-au.english: We have a large community of developers who watch out for each other.

setting.third-party-plugin.label-donate-.english: Plugin developers are community volunteers who make amazing things out of passion. If you find this plugin useful, please consider funding its development.
setting.third-party-plugin.label-donate-.chinese: 插件开发者为这款插件付出了大量的时间与精力。如果你觉得这个插件很有用，就支持一下开发吧！

plugins.graph-view.tooltip-start-timelap.chinese: 播放关系图谱生长动画

plugins.backlinks.desc.english: Show links from other files to the current file. Backlinks can be shown in a separate view or at the bottom of the note.
plugins.backlinks.desc.chinese: 在状态栏中显示指向当前笔记的链接的情况。

plugins.backlinks.action-open.chinese: 在新标签页中打开反向链接列表

plugins.backlinks.action-open-for-curren.english: Open backlinks for the current note
plugins.backlinks.action-open-for-curren.chinese: 在新标签页中打开反向链接列表

plugins.backlinks.action-toggle-backlink.chinese: 在标签页中显示反向链接

plugins.backlinks.menu-opt-backlinks-in-.chinese: 在标签页中显示反向链接

plugins.backlinks.label-no-backlinks.chinese: 没有笔记链接当前文件

plugins.backlinks.label-no-unlinked-ment.chinese: 没有笔记提到当前文件名

plugins.backlinks.option-backlink-in-doc.english: Show backlinks at the bottom of notes
plugins.backlinks.option-backlink-in-doc.chinese: 在标签页中显示反向链接

plugins.backlinks.option-backlink-in-doc.english: Make backlinks visible in new tabs by default.
plugins.backlinks.option-backlink-in-doc.chinese: 在标签页底部显示当前笔记的反向链接。

plugins.outgoing-links.desc.english: Show outgoing links and detect unlinked mentions of other notes in the current note.
plugins.outgoing-links.desc.chinese: 显示当前笔记中已存在的链接并检测可能存在的链接。

plugins.outgoing-links.action-open.chinese: 在新标签页中打开出链列表

plugins.outgoing-links.action-open-for-c.english: Open outgoing links for the current file
plugins.outgoing-links.action-open-for-c.chinese: 在新标签页中打开当前笔记的出链列表

plugins.outgoing-links.label-no-links.chinese: 当前笔记中不存在链接

plugins.outgoing-links.label-unlinked-me.chinese: 当前笔记中潜在的链接

plugins.tag-pane.desc.english: Show a list of all tags and their number of occurrences.
plugins.tag-pane.desc.chinese: 显示所有标签及其出现的次数。

plugins.properties.desc.english: Show the metadata for your files in the sidebar.

plugins.properties.action-show-local.chinese: 显示当前笔记的属性列表

plugins.properties.msg-merge-properties-.english: In case of conflicts, the values will be merged or the value from “{{oldKey}}” will be used.
plugins.properties.msg-merge-properties-.chinese: 为防止冲突，属性值将被合并，或仅使用来自属性“{{oldKey}}”的值。

plugins.page-preview.desc.english: Hover an internal link to preview its content. In editor mode, press Ctrl/Cmd while hovering.
plugins.page-preview.desc.chinese: 开启后鼠标悬停在内部链接上时将显示预览。编辑模式下需要在鼠标悬停的同时按住 Ctrl/Cmd 键才可预览（该设置可调节）。

plugins.page-preview.label-empty-note.english: “{{linktext}}” is not created yet. Click to create.

plugins.page-preview.label-missing-footo.english: Footnote {{id}} not found. Click to create.
plugins.page-preview.label-missing-footo.chinese: 脚注 {{id}} 未找到，点击以创建。

plugins.page-preview.label-source-search.chinese: 搜索页、反向链接列表和出链列表

plugins.page-preview.label-require-mod.english: Require {{key}} to trigger page preview on hover
plugins.page-preview.label-require-mod.chinese: 需要按住 {{key}} 来触发页面预览的情景

plugins.bookmarks.desc.english: Save shortcuts to files, searches, headings, and graphs.
plugins.bookmarks.desc.chinese: 为常用文件及搜索加上书签。

plugins.bookmarks.action-remove-bookmark.english: Remove bookmark for the current file

plugins.bookmarks.action-bookmark-tab-gr.chinese: 收藏当前 {{count}} 个标签页
收藏当前 {{count}} 个标签页

plugins.bookmarks.msg-no-search-query.chinese: 没有可加上书签的搜询。

plugins.custom-css.desc.english: Read and apply “obsidian.css” in the vault folder.

plugins.custom-css.msg-fetching-themes.chinese: 正在获取社区主题数据……

plugins.custom-css.label-dark-theme-only.chinese: 仅限有深色配色的主题

plugins.custom-css.label-light-theme-onl.chinese: 仅限有浅色配色的主题

plugins.custom-css.label-no-readme.english: This theme did not provide a README file.
plugins.custom-css.label-no-readme.chinese: 这个主题没有提供 README 文件

plugins.custom-css.msg-load-error.english: Could not load community themes, please check your network.
plugins.custom-css.msg-load-error.chinese: 无法加载社区主题，请检查你的网络。

plugins.custom-css.msg-now-using-theme.english: You're now using {{title}} as your CSS theme.

plugins.custom-css.msg-updates-found.chinese: 找到 {{count}} 个可更新的主题

plugins.custom-css.msg-updates-found_plu.chinese: 找到 {{count}} 可更新的主题

plugins.command-palette.desc.english: Use Cmd/Ctrl+P and begin typing to invoke a command.
plugins.command-palette.desc.chinese: 无需界面或快捷键操作，输入一个命令即可完成相应功能。

plugins.command-palette.option-add-new-p.english: Pinned commands will appear at the top of all commands when no search query is present.
plugins.command-palette.option-add-new-p.chinese: 在你未进行检索时，置顶命令将优先出现在命令面板的顶端。

plugins.markdown-format-importer.desc.english: Convert Markdown from other apps to Obsidian format.
plugins.markdown-format-importer.desc.chinese: 将其他应用中的 Markdown 格式转换为 Obsidian 支持的格式。

plugins.markdown-format-importer.action-.chinese: 打开 Markdown 格式转换器

plugins.markdown-format-importer.option-.chinese: 转换 Roam Research 标签语法
将 Roam Research 风格的 "#tag" 和 "#[[tag]]" 标签转换为 "[[tag]]"。
转换 Roam Research 高亮语法
将 Roam Research 中的 "^^highlight^^" 高亮语法转换为 "==highlight=="。
转换 Roam Research 待办事项语法
将 Roam Research 中的 "{{[[TODO]]}}" 代办事项语法转换为 "[ ]"。
转换 Bear 高亮语法
将 Bear 中的 "::highlight::" 高亮语法转换为 "==highlight=="。

plugins.markdown-format-importer.zettelk.chinese: 转换 zettelkasten 风格链接

plugins.markdown-format-importer.zettelk.english: Fixes “[[UID]]” links to full “[[UID File Name]]”.
plugins.markdown-format-importer.zettelk.chinese: 将 zettelkasten 卡片中使用的 "[[UID]]" 链接转换为 "[[UID 文件名]]" 的形式。
美化 zettelkasten 风格链接

plugins.markdown-format-importer.zettelk.english: Fixes “[[UID]]” links and also beautify them “[[UID File Name|File Name]]”.
plugins.markdown-format-importer.zettelk.chinese: 将 zettelkasten 卡片中使用的 "[[UID]]" 链接美化为 "[[UID 文件名|文件名]]" 的形式。

plugins.markdown-format-importer.msg-all.english: Warning: the converter will convert all the files in your vault, not just the current file.
plugins.markdown-format-importer.msg-all.chinese: 警告：转换器将对仓库中所有文件进行修改，而不仅是当前文件。

plugins.markdown-format-importer.msg-ove.english: Your files will be overwritten. Back up all your files before attempting conversion.
plugins.markdown-format-importer.msg-ove.chinese: 你的文件将被修改。请在转换前做好备份。

plugins.daily-notes.desc.english: Create or open today's daily note.
plugins.daily-notes.desc.chinese: 打开今天的日记。如果该日记不存在，则创建该日记。

plugins.daily-notes.msg-fail-format.english: Failed to create daily note. “{{format}}” is not a valid format.
plugins.daily-notes.msg-fail-format.chinese: 创建日记未成功。 "{{format}}" 不是有效的格式。

plugins.daily-notes.msg-fail-folder.english: Failed to create daily note. Folder “{{folderOption}}” not found.
plugins.daily-notes.msg-fail-folder.chinese: 创建日记未成功。 未找到 "{{folderOption}}" 文件夹。

plugins.daily-notes.msg-fail-template-fi.english: Failed to create daily note. Template file “{{template}}” not found.
plugins.daily-notes.msg-fail-template-fi.chinese: 创建日记未成功。未找到 "{{template}}" 模板文件。

plugins.daily-notes.msg-no-previous.english: There's no daily note before this one.

plugins.daily-notes.msg-no-next.english: There's no daily note after this one.

plugins.daily-notes.label-syntax-live-pr.english: Your current syntax looks like this:
plugins.daily-notes.label-syntax-live-pr.chinese: 这是当前所用格式的样例:

plugins.daily-notes.option-new-file-loca.english: New daily notes will be placed here.
plugins.daily-notes.option-new-file-loca.chinese: 指定新建日记的存放路径。

plugins.daily-notes.option-template-desc.english: Choose the file to use as a template.
plugins.daily-notes.option-template-desc.chinese: 指定日记模板文件的路径。

plugins.daily-notes.option-open-on-start.english: Open your daily note automatically whenever you open this vault.
plugins.daily-notes.option-open-on-start.chinese: 开启后，每次打开当前仓库时将自动打开日记页面。

plugins.unique-note-creator.desc.english: Create notes with unique timestamp prefixes, for workflows like zettelkasten or slip box.
plugins.unique-note-creator.desc.chinese: 创建以时间戳为文件名的笔记，常用于 Zettelkasten 等方法中。

plugins.unique-note-creator.option-new-f.english: The folder path to create the new unique note in.
plugins.unique-note-creator.option-new-f.chinese: 指定新建时间戳笔记的存放路径。

plugins.unique-note-creator.msg-folder-n.english: Failed to create unique note. Folder “{{folderOption}}” not found.
plugins.unique-note-creator.msg-folder-n.chinese: 创建时间戳笔记失败，"{{folderOption}}" 文件夹未找到。

plugins.unique-note-creator.option-templ.english: The file path to use as template.
plugins.unique-note-creator.option-templ.chinese: 指定用于生成时间戳笔记的模板文件的位置。

plugins.unique-note-creator.msg-template.english: Failed to create unique note. Template file “{{template}}” not found.
plugins.unique-note-creator.msg-template.chinese: 创建时间戳笔记失败，模板文件"{{template}}"未找到。

plugins.unique-note-creator.msg-failed-t.english: Failed to generate a unique note with the format “{{format}}”
plugins.unique-note-creator.msg-failed-t.chinese: 无法以 "{{format}} 格式创建时间戳笔记

plugins.random-note.desc.english: Open a random note to rediscover or review.
plugins.random-note.desc.chinese: 随机打开一则笔记，以助于回顾和发现。

plugins.outline.desc.english: Show the table of contents for the current note.
plugins.outline.desc.chinese: 显示当前笔记或链接笔记的小标题列表。

plugins.outline.action-open-for-current.english: Open outline of the current file

plugins.word-count.desc.english: Show word count in the status bar.

plugins.slides.desc.english: Create a presentation by using “---” to separate slides.
plugins.slides.desc.chinese: 演示当前笔记。你可以通过键入 "---" 来分隔每一页幻灯片的内容。

plugins.audio-recorder.desc.english: Record audio notes and save them as attachments.
plugins.audio-recorder.desc.chinese: 录制音频并保存为附件。

plugins.audio-recorder.msg-access-denied.english: Microphone access was denied, please enable it from the preference pane.
plugins.audio-recorder.msg-access-denied.chinese: 访问被拒绝，请在设置中启用麦克风。

plugins.audio-recorder.msg-pending-grant.english: Please grant microphone permission to start recording.
plugins.audio-recorder.msg-pending-grant.chinese: 请授权麦克风开始录音。

plugins.open-with-default-app.desc.english: Add a button to open the current file in its default app.
plugins.open-with-default-app.desc.chinese: 在菜单中添加【使用默认应用打开当前文件】这一选项。

plugins.open-with-default-app.action-sho.chinese: 在系统资源管理器中显示

plugins.templates.desc.english: Insert template content from a folder of template files.
plugins.templates.desc.chinese: 插入模板文件夹中的模板文件内容。

plugins.templates.option-template-folder.english: Files in this folder will be available as templates.
plugins.templates.option-template-folder.chinese: 该文件夹中的文件都可以作为模板。

plugins.templates.option-template-date-f.english: {{date}} in the template file will be replaced with this value.
plugins.templates.option-template-date-f.chinese: 模板文件中的 {{date}} 字段将被一个日期值替换。日期值的格式由此项控制。

plugins.templates.option-template-date-f.english: You can also use {{date:YYYY-MM-DD}} to override the format once.
plugins.templates.option-template-date-f.chinese: 你也可以使用 {{date:YYYY-MM-DD}} 字段在模板中直接指定日期值的格式。这将覆盖此项。

plugins.templates.option-template-time-f.english: {{time}} in the template file will be replaced with this value.
plugins.templates.option-template-time-f.chinese: 模板文件中的 {{time}} 字段将被一个时间值替换。时间值的格式由此项控制。

plugins.templates.option-template-time-f.english: You can also use {{time:HH:mm}} to override the format once.
plugins.templates.option-template-time-f.chinese: 你也可以使用 {{time:HH:mm}} 字段在模板中直接指定时间值的格式。这将覆盖此项。

plugins.templates.msg-fail-invalid-folde.english: Failed to list templates. Template folder is invalid.
plugins.templates.msg-fail-invalid-folde.chinese: 插入模板未成功，模板文件夹无效。

plugins.templates.msg-fail-folder-not-fo.english: Failed to list templates. Folder “{{folderOption}}” not found.
plugins.templates.msg-fail-folder-not-fo.chinese: 插入模板未成功，未找到 "{{folderOption}}" 文件夹。

plugins.templates.msg-fail-invalid-templ.english: Unable to insert template, the properties in the template file could not be read.
plugins.templates.msg-fail-invalid-templ.chinese: 无法插入模板，未能读取模板文件中的属性。

plugins.templates.msg-no-folder-set.english: Failed to list templates. No template folder configured.
plugins.templates.msg-no-folder-set.chinese: 列出模板列表未成功。未配置模板文件夹。

plugins.translucency.desc.english: Turn on translucency effect to enhance a sense of depth. Best used with dark mode. Not supported on Linux.
plugins.translucency.desc.chinese: 开启半透明效果以增强沉浸感（深色模式下开启效果更佳）。Linux 不支持此效果。

plugins.slash-command.desc.english: Trigger commands in the editor by using the forward slash key.
plugins.slash-command.desc.chinese: 启用后，在编辑器中输入斜杠即可触发命令。

plugins.editor-status.name.english: Show editing mode in status bar

plugins.editor-status.desc.english: Show the editing mode toggle in the status bar.
plugins.editor-status.desc.chinese: 开启后将在状态栏中添加一个显示当前标签页视图状态的按钮，点击按钮可切换当前标签页视图状态。

plugins.publish.desc.english: Host your notes online as a website, wiki or documentation.
plugins.publish.desc.chinese: 通过 Obsidian 发布服务发布你的笔记。

plugins.publish.label-no-internet-access.english: You need access to the internet to publish changes.
plugins.publish.label-no-internet-access.chinese: 你需要联网才能发布更改。

plugins.publish.label-publish-service-de.english: Obsidian Publish is an add-on paid service that lets you publish your notes online directly from Obsidian.
plugins.publish.label-publish-service-de.chinese: 【发布】是一项付费服务，可以让你通过 Obsidian 发布在线笔记。

plugins.publish.label-please-login.english: To start publishing, please log in or create a new Obsidian account.
plugins.publish.label-please-login.chinese: 要使用发布功能，请登录或创建一个 Obsidian 帐号。

plugins.publish.label-no-publish-subscri.english: You do not have an Obsidian Publish subscription yet.
plugins.publish.label-no-publish-subscri.chinese: 你还没有购买发布服务。

plugins.publish.label-delete-site-confir.english: Are you sure you want to delete this site?
plugins.publish.label-delete-site-confir.chinese: 你确定要删除此网站吗？

plugins.publish.label-delete-site-detail.english: This will immediately and permanently delete your site.
plugins.publish.label-delete-site-detail.chinese: 这将会立即删除你的网站。注意：删除是不可恢复的。

plugins.publish.option-site-id-descripti.english: Your site will be at https://publish.obsidian.md/{site id}. You can change this later. Only lower case letters, numbers, and dashes are allowed.
plugins.publish.option-site-id-descripti.chinese: 你的网站将使用以下地址：https://publish.obsidian.md/{网站 id} 。网站 ID 允许后续修改，但仅允许使用小写字母、数字和破折号。

plugins.publish.msg-invalid-site-id.english: Site ID can only contain lowercase letters, numbers, and dashes.
plugins.publish.msg-invalid-site-id.chinese: 网站 ID 只能包含小写字母、数字和破折号。

plugins.publish.msg-site-id-in-use.english: This site ID is in use, please try another one.
plugins.publish.msg-site-id-in-use.chinese: 此网站 ID 已被使用，请尝试另一个 ID。

plugins.publish.msg-create-site-issue.english: There was an issue when creating your site.

plugins.publish.option-site-name-descrip.english: Name of your published site. It will show up in the page title of your site.
plugins.publish.option-site-name-descrip.chinese: 设置当前网站的名称。网站名称将显示在当前网站的页面标题中。

plugins.publish.option-home-page-file-de.english: The first page the user sees when landing on your published site
plugins.publish.option-home-page-file-de.chinese: 设置用户在访问网站时首先看到的页面。

plugins.publish.option-home-page-file-pl.chinese: 选择一个已发布的文件

plugins.publish.option-logo-description.english: Pick an image file as your site logo.
plugins.publish.option-logo-description.chinese: 选择一个图片文件作为你的网站标志。

plugins.publish.option-logo-placeholder.english: Any uploaded image in your vault...
plugins.publish.option-logo-placeholder.chinese: 选择一张仓库中已上传的图片……

plugins.publish.option-customize-navigat.english: Override the order of navigation items and hide pages or folders from showing.
plugins.publish.option-customize-navigat.chinese: 自定义文件列表中文件和文件夹的顺序，或隐藏某些文件和文件夹。

plugins.publish.option-hide-items-in-nav.english: Hide pages or folders from navigation
plugins.publish.option-hide-items-in-nav.chinese: 在文件列表中隐藏文件或文件夹

plugins.publish.option-hide-items-in-nav.english: Right click and select “Hide” to prevent specific pages from appearing in the site navigation. The pages will still be accessible via links or accessing the URL directly.
plugins.publish.option-hide-items-in-nav.chinese: 右键点击文件或文件夹并点击 "隐藏" 即可让相应文件或文件夹不在网站的文件列表中出现。但相应页面仍可通过链接或 URL 进行访问。

plugins.publish.label-navigation-modal-d.english: Drag and drop to customize the order in which navigation items appear on your Publish site.
plugins.publish.label-navigation-modal-d.chinese: 拖动文件或文件夹以调整各文件和文件夹在网站文件列表中的顺序。

plugins.publish.option-theme-description.english: Choose default color scheme for your site.
plugins.publish.option-theme-description.chinese: 设置当前网站的配色方案。

plugins.publish.option-show-theme-toggle.english: Let visitors toggle between light and dark theme on their own.
plugins.publish.option-show-theme-toggle.chinese: 让访客可以看到颜色切换按钮，以自行在浅色与深色模式间切换。

plugins.publish.option-show-navigation-d.english: Display a list of all published pages on the left side of your published site.
plugins.publish.option-show-navigation-d.chinese: 在网站的左侧显示一个文件列表，列表汇总了所有已发布的文件。

plugins.publish.option-show-search-descr.english: Display a search bar that lets the visitors search pages, aliases, and headings on your site.
plugins.publish.option-show-search-descr.chinese: 在文件列表顶部显示搜索栏，从而让访客能够搜索网站内容。

plugins.publish.option-show-graph-descri.english: Display a small local graph on each page.
plugins.publish.option-show-graph-descri.chinese: 在每个页面上显示局部关系图，从而展示当前页面的链接情况。

plugins.publish.option-show-outline-desc.english: Display the outline of headings on each page.
plugins.publish.option-show-outline-desc.chinese: 开启后，在每个页面上显示由小标题组成的大纲。

plugins.publish.option-show-backlinks-de.english: Show backlink section at the end of each page.
plugins.publish.option-show-backlinks-de.chinese: 在每个页面底部显示反向链接。

plugins.publish.option-sliding-window-mo.english: Links will open next to the current page in the same window. Scroll horizontally to see stacked pages.
plugins.publish.option-sliding-window-mo.chinese: 开启后，标签页将以堆叠方式显示。

plugins.publish.option-hover-preview-fil.english: Display page preview when hovering links.
plugins.publish.option-hover-preview-fil.chinese: 开启后，当鼠标悬停在链接上时将显示页面预览。

plugins.publish.option-hide-title-descri.english: Hide the page title heading. Useful when you have your own headings at the beginning of each page.
plugins.publish.option-hide-title-descri.chinese: 开启后将隐藏页内的标题。这个设置对于将一级小标题用作标题的笔记非常有用。

plugins.publish.option-readable-line-len.english: Limit maximum line length. Fits less content on the screen, but makes long paragraphs more readable.
plugins.publish.option-readable-line-len.chinese: 开启后将限制每行字数，使屏幕显示的内容减少，但使较长的段落更具可读性。

plugins.publish.option-site-password-des.english: Restrict access to your site with passwords.
plugins.publish.option-site-password-des.chinese: 使用密码限制访问者对网站的访问。

plugins.publish.option-google-analytics-.english: Configure Google Analytics for your site. Only available for visitors from your custom domain URL. Please check with your local laws and regulations first.
plugins.publish.option-google-analytics-.chinese: 为你的网站配置谷歌分析跟踪功能。该功能仅限于从自定义域名进行访问的访客。使用该功能前请先查阅当地的法律法规是否允许跟踪访客。

plugins.publish.tooltip-add-linked.english: Add all files that are linked by currently selected items
plugins.publish.tooltip-add-linked.chinese: 添加所有被当前项目链接的文件

plugins.publish.msg-added-linked-files.chinese: 已添加 {{count}} 个链接文件

plugins.publish.msg-added-linked-files_p.chinese: 已添加 {{count}} 个链接文件。

plugins.publish.msg-no-permission-to-pub.english: You do not have permissions to publish to the current site.
plugins.publish.msg-no-permission-to-pub.chinese: 你无权发布到当前网站。

plugins.publish.msg-select-at-least-one-.english: Please select at least one file.

plugins.publish.label-clear-cache.english: It takes up to a few minutes for the changes to show up on your site. If you do not see your latest changes, try clearing the cache in your browser.
plugins.publish.label-clear-cache.chinese: 更改的内容可能需要几分钟才能显示在当前网站上。如果看不到最新更改，请尝试在浏览器中清除缓存。

plugins.publish.label-visit-site.english: You can visit your site here:
plugins.publish.label-visit-site.chinese: 你可以在这里访问你的网站：

plugins.publish.msg-something-went-wrong.chinese: 出现问题。请检查开发者控制台以获取详细信息。

plugins.publish.label-no-password.english: Your site currently does not have any passwords. Anyone can visit it.
plugins.publish.label-no-password.chinese: 当前网站没有设置任何密码。任何人都可以访问。

plugins.publish.label-have-password.english: Your site is password protected. If you have multiple passwords, visitors can access your site by entering any of them.
plugins.publish.label-have-password.chinese: 当前网站已被密码保护。如果你有多个密码，访客可以输入任意一个密码来访问当前网站。

plugins.publish.option-password-desc.english: A hash of your password will be stored securely. Once the password is set, it cannot be revealed in plaintext.
plugins.publish.option-password-desc.chinese: 密码的哈希值将被 Obsidian 妥善保存。密码一旦设置完成将无法显示为明文。

plugins.publish.option-nickname-desc.english: Set a nickname to remind yourself what or who the password is for.
plugins.publish.option-nickname-desc.chinese: 为密码设置一个名称，以提示密码的用途。

plugins.publish.option-custom-domain-des.english: Use your own domain rather than the https://publish.obsidian.md/{site id} URL.
plugins.publish.option-custom-domain-des.chinese: 使用你自己的域名而不是 https://publish.obsidian.md/{网站 id} 链接。

plugins.publish.option-noindex-desc.english: Prevent search engines from indexing your site.
plugins.publish.option-noindex-desc.chinese: 防止搜索引擎索引你的网站。

plugins.publish.option-custom-url-desc.english: The URL that your site will be located at.

plugins.publish.option-custom-url-redire.chinese: 重定向至你的自定义域名

plugins.publish.option-custom-url-redire.english: Redirect visitors on publish.obsidian.md/id to your custom domain.
plugins.publish.option-custom-url-redire.chinese: 将 publish.obsidian.md/id 上的访客重定向至你的自定义域名。

plugins.publish.label-custom-domain-inst.english: Please refer to our {{link}} on our help site for more information.

plugins.publish.label-site-usage.chinese: 你使用的 {{site}} 超出了你的 {{limit}}。

plugins.publish.label-sharing-with-users.english: This site is currently shared with the following people:
plugins.publish.label-sharing-with-users.chinese: 这个网站目前已和这些人共享

plugins.publish.label-not-sharing.english: This site is not currently shared with anyone.
plugins.publish.label-not-sharing.chinese: 这个网站目前没有共享给任何人

plugins.publish.error-email-must-be-vali.english: Please enter a valid email to invite someone.
plugins.publish.error-email-must-be-vali.chinese: 请输入有效的邮件地址

plugins.publish.msg-enable-publish-plugi.english: Please enable the Publish core plugin in Settings -> Core plugins to view sites.
plugins.publish.msg-enable-publish-plugi.chinese: 请在 设置 -> 核心插件 中查看网站

plugins.publish.label-leave-site-confirm.chinese: 确认停止这个网站的协作

plugins.publish.label-leave-site-confirm.english: This will remove this site from the list of sites shared with you. This action cannot be reverted.
plugins.publish.label-leave-site-confirm.chinese: 该网站将从与你共享的网站中移除，这个操作是永久且不可逆的

plugins.publish.label-leave-site-confirm.english: Please contact the owner of the site if you wish to collaborate on this site again.
plugins.publish.label-leave-site-confirm.chinese: 如果你想重新加入这个网站的协作，请联系网站的拥有者

plugins.publish.label-confirm-override-1.english: Are you sure you want to override the local version?

plugins.publish.label-confirm-override-2.english: The live version will be used and your local version will be discarded. Please make backups if necessary.
plugins.publish.label-confirm-override-2.chinese: 将使用网站版本，本地版本将被覆盖。如有必要，请备份本地版本。

plugins.publish.message-successfully-use.english: Successfully used live version to override your local version.
plugins.publish.message-successfully-use.chinese: 已成功使用网站版本覆盖本地版本。

plugins.publish.option-included-folders-.english: Files under these folders will automatically be selected when you review changes to publish.
plugins.publish.option-included-folders-.chinese: 这些文件夹中的文件将会进入发布队列。

plugins.publish.option-excluded-folders-.english: Files under these folders won't show up when you review changes to publish. This setting takes priority over included folders above.
plugins.publish.option-excluded-folders-.chinese: 这些文件夹中的文件将不进入发布队列。此设置优先于默认发布文件夹设置。

plugins.publish.label-number-of-folders-.chinese: 目前以下文件夹中的文件将默认加入发布队列：{{folders}}。
目前以下文件夹中的文件将不加入发布队列：{{folders}}。

plugins.publish.label-add-included-folde.english: You can include both existing folders and folders that have not been created yet.
plugins.publish.label-add-included-folde.chinese: 可以添加现有文件夹和尚未创建的文件夹。

plugins.workspaces.desc.chinese: 保存和加载工作区布局。

plugins.workspaces.placeholder-save-curr.chinese: 输入名称以保存当前工作区布局……

plugins.workspaces.msg-enter-name.english: Please enter a name for the new layout.

plugins.sync.desc.english: Synchronize your files through Obsidian Sync.
plugins.sync.desc.chinese: 通过 Obsidian Sync 同步你的文件

plugins.sync.action-view-version-history.english: Open version history for the current file

plugins.sync.msg-already-latest-version.english: This version is already the latest version.

plugins.sync.label-file-deleted-via.chinese: 已由设备 {{ device }} 删除

plugins.sync.label-file-renamed-from.chinese: 此文件由 "{{filepath}}" 重命名而来

plugins.sync.label-no-history.english: No sync history for this file.

plugins.sync.label-unable-to-retrieve.chinese: 无法检索版本历史记录

plugins.sync.label-click-to-see-history.english: Click on a file to see its history.

plugins.sync.label-remote-vault-explanat.english: Remote vaults securely synchronize your vault between devices.
plugins.sync.label-remote-vault-explanat.chinese: 远程仓库能安全地将库中内容同步到不同设备上。

plugins.sync.option-vault-name-desc.english: Helps you remember what this vault is for.
plugins.sync.option-vault-name-desc.chinese: 名称最好提示该远程仓库的用途。

plugins.sync.option-vault-region-desc.english: Select the server region closest to you to store the remote vault. This cannot be changed in the future.
plugins.sync.option-vault-region-desc.chinese: 请选择离你最近的区域以存储远程仓库。该设置在将来无法被修改。

plugins.sync.option-encryption-desc.english: End-to-end encryption offers the strongest security but requires you to safely store your encryption password. Standard encryption uses a key managed by Obsidian to protect your data in transit and on our servers.
plugins.sync.option-encryption-desc.chinese: 端到端加密提供最强的安全性，但需要你安全地存储加密密码。标准加密使用 Obsidian 管理的密钥来保护数据在传输和服务器上的安全性。

plugins.sync.option-encryption-warning.english: This option cannot be changed later.
plugins.sync.option-encryption-warning.chinese: 此选项无法在之后修改。

plugins.sync.option-encryption-password-.english: This password cannot be changed later.
plugins.sync.option-encryption-password-.chinese: 此密码设置后不能更改。

plugins.sync.option-encryption-password-.english: If you forget this password, any remote data will remain unusable forever.
plugins.sync.option-encryption-password-.chinese: 如果你忘记了自定义加密密码，该远程仓库所有远程数据将永远无法使用。

plugins.sync.option-encryption-password-.english: This does not affect your local data.
plugins.sync.option-encryption-password-.chinese: 但这不会影响本地数据。

plugins.sync.label-encryption-password-e.english: The remote vault “{{name}}” is currently encrypted. Enter your password to unlock.
plugins.sync.label-encryption-password-e.chinese: 远程仓库 “{{name}}” 已被加密。请输入密码解锁。

plugins.sync.label-rename-remote-vault-d.english: Enter a new name for this remote vault.
plugins.sync.label-rename-remote-vault-d.chinese: 输入这个远程仓库的新名字。

plugins.sync.label-confirm-delete-remote.english: Are you sure you want to delete the remote vault "{{name}}"?
plugins.sync.label-confirm-delete-remote.chinese: 你确定要删除这个远程仓库吗？

plugins.sync.label-confirm-delete-remote.english: All data on our server, including version history, will be deleted. Your local files will stay intact.
plugins.sync.label-confirm-delete-remote.chinese: 这将使得该远程仓库中的所有数据，包括版本历史，都被删除。但你的本地文件不受影响。

plugins.sync.label-confirm-delete-remote.english: This action is permanent and irreversible.
plugins.sync.label-confirm-delete-remote.chinese: 这个操作是永久性的且不可逆的。

plugins.sync.msg-remote-vault-deleted.chinese: 远程仓库 {{name}} 已被删除。

plugins.sync.msg-disconnect-from-deleted.english: Obsidian Sync: The connected remote vault no longer exists.
plugins.sync.msg-disconnect-from-deleted.chinese: Obsidian 同步服务：所连接的远程仓库已删除。

plugins.sync.label-not-remote-vaults.english: You don't have any remote vaults.

plugins.sync.label-no-subscription.english: You don't have an active Obsidian Sync subscription.
plugins.sync.label-no-subscription.chinese: 你没有订阅 Obsidian 同步服务。

plugins.sync.label-third-party-sync-warn.chinese: 检测到文件同步服务冲突

plugins.sync.label-third-party-sync-warn.english: Warning: Your vault seems to be using {{service}} as a third party sync service. If you use Obsidian Sync with this vault, you may run into conflicts, file corruption, or data loss.
plugins.sync.label-third-party-sync-warn.chinese: 警告：你的仓库似乎正在使用 {{service}} 作为第三方同步服务。 如果你在该仓库中同时使用 Obsidian 同步服务，你可能会遇到文件冲突、损坏或数据丢失等情况。

plugins.sync.label-icloud-drive-warning.english: If you are using iCloud Drive, your Documents and Desktop folders might be synced by iCloud. This could cause conflicts with Obsidian Sync.
plugins.sync.label-icloud-drive-warning.chinese: 如果你正在使用iCloud，你的文档与桌面文件夹可能会通过 iCloud 同步。这可能会与 Obsidian 同步服务冲突。

plugins.sync.option-remote-vault-desc-co.english: Currently connected to the “{{name}}” remote vault.
plugins.sync.option-remote-vault-desc-co.chinese: 正在与远程仓库 "{{name}}" 同步。

plugins.sync.option-remote-vault-desc-no.english: Currently not connected to any remote vault.
plugins.sync.option-remote-vault-desc-no.chinese: 未与任何远程仓库同步。

plugins.sync.option-sync-status-desc-run.chinese: Obsidian 同步功能正在运行。

plugins.sync.option-device-name-desc.english: This name will be displayed in the activity log. Leave empty to use the default name.
plugins.sync.option-device-name-desc.chinese: 该名称将在同步日志中使用。留空则使用默认设备名称。

plugins.sync.option-view-deleted-files-d.chinese: 浏览、恢复已删除的文件。

plugins.sync.option-sync-log-desc.english: View recent sync activities for debugging.
plugins.sync.option-sync-log-desc.chinese: 查看最近的同步事件以进行调试。

plugins.sync.msg-restoring-complete.chinese: `恢复完成：{{succeeded}} 个成功，{{failed}} 个失败。`

plugins.sync.option-vault-size-unknown.english: Unable to retrieve your vault size.
plugins.sync.option-vault-size-unknown.chinese: 无法检索你的仓库大小。

plugins.sync.option-vault-size-loading.chinese: 正在检索你的仓库大小……

plugins.sync.option-almost-over-size.chinese: 远程仓库容量接近上限

plugins.sync.msg-largest-files-desc.english: These are the remote files that are taking the most space. After deleting attachments, use the purge button to free up remote vault space.
plugins.sync.msg-largest-files-desc.chinese: 这些是远程仓库中最占空间的文件。选中它们后，请按下清除按钮以释放远程仓库空间。

plugins.sync.tooltip-purge-remote.english: Permanently purge deleted attachments from remote vault to save space.
plugins.sync.tooltip-purge-remote.chinese: 在远程仓库中永久清除已删除的文件以节省空间。

plugins.sync.option-prevent-sleep-desc.english: Prevents the device from going to sleep when there are still files to be synced.
plugins.sync.option-prevent-sleep-desc.chinese: 在同步未完成时，防止设备进入睡眠状态。

plugins.sync.option-excluded-folder-desc.english: Prevent certain folders from being synced.
plugins.sync.option-excluded-folder-desc.chinese: 防止某些文件夹被同步。

plugins.sync.option-currently-excluded-f.chinese: 目前这些文件夹被排除在外：

plugins.sync.option-sync-image-desc.english: Sync image files with these extensions: {{extensions}}.
plugins.sync.option-sync-image-desc.chinese: 同步以下类型的图片文件：{{extensions}}。

plugins.sync.option-sync-audio-desc.english: Sync audio files with these extensions: {{extensions}}.
plugins.sync.option-sync-audio-desc.chinese: 同步以下类型的音频文件：{{extensions}}。

plugins.sync.option-sync-video-desc.english: Sync video files with these extensions: {{extensions}}.
plugins.sync.option-sync-video-desc.chinese: 同步以下类型的视频文件：{{extensions}}。

plugins.sync.option-sync-unsupported.chinese: 同步所有其他类型文件

plugins.sync.option-sync-unsupported-des.chinese: 同步那些无法在 Obsidian 中打开的文件。

plugins.sync.option-view-config-files-de.english: View and restore version history of setting files.

plugins.sync.option-sync-app-desc.english: Enable to sync editor settings, files & links settings, etc.
plugins.sync.option-sync-app-desc.chinese: 同步编辑器、文件与链接、快捷键等方面的设置。

plugins.sync.option-sync-appearance-desc.english: Sync appearance settings like dark mode, active theme, and enabled snippets.
plugins.sync.option-sync-appearance-desc.chinese: 同步外观设置，比如基础颜色、当前应用的主题、开启的 CSS 代码片段等设置信息。

plugins.sync.option-sync-appearance-data.chinese: 主题与 CSS 代码片段

plugins.sync.option-sync-appearance-data.english: Sync downloaded themes and snippets. Whether they are enabled depends on the previous setting.
plugins.sync.option-sync-appearance-data.chinese: 同步已保存的主题与 CSS 代码片段文件。文件启用情况由上一同步设置决定。

plugins.sync.option-sync-core-plugin-des.english: Sync which core plugins are enabled.
plugins.sync.option-sync-core-plugin-des.chinese: 同步核心插件的启用情况。

plugins.sync.option-sync-core-plugin-dat.chinese: 同步核心插件的设置信息

plugins.sync.option-sync-community-plugi.english: Sync which community plugins are enabled.
plugins.sync.option-sync-community-plugi.chinese: 同步社区插件的启用情况。

plugins.sync.option-sync-community-plugi.english: Sync installed community plugins (.js, .css, and manifest.json files) and their settings.
plugins.sync.option-sync-community-plugi.chinese: 同步已安装的社区插件，包括插件中的 `.js`、`.css`、`manifest.json`等文件，以及插件的设置信息。

plugins.sync.label-sync-introduction.english: Obsidian Sync is Obsidian's add-on sync service with end-to-end encryption and version history.
plugins.sync.label-sync-introduction.chinese: 同步是 Obsidian 提供的附加服务，具有端到端加密及版本历史等功能。

plugins.sync.label-account-required.english: To start syncing, please log in or create a new Obsidian account.
plugins.sync.label-account-required.chinese: 要使用同步服务，请登陆或注册 Obsidian 账户。

plugins.sync.label-add-excluded-folder-d.english: You can exclude both existing folders and folders that have not been created yet.
plugins.sync.label-add-excluded-folder-d.chinese: 可以排除已经存在的和未创建的文件夹。

plugins.sync.msg-vault-has-notes.english: Your local vault already contains some notes.
plugins.sync.msg-vault-has-notes.chinese: 你的本地仓库中存在一些文件。

plugins.sync.msg-vault-merge-warning.english: If you connect to the remote vault “{{name}}”, notes in your local vault will be merged with notes from your remote vault. In case of conflicts, the most recent version of the note will be preserved.
plugins.sync.msg-vault-merge-warning.chinese: 如果需要将当前本地仓库与远程仓库 "{{name}}" 关联，当前本地仓库中的笔记将会与远程仓库中的笔记合并。如果合并时存在冲突，将保留笔记最新的版本。

plugins.sync.tooltip-update-setting-on-a.english: Please update this option and restart app on all the devices where you want it to take effect.
plugins.sync.tooltip-update-setting-on-a.chinese: 请更新此选项，并在希望生效的所有设备上重启软件。

plugins.sync.label-sharing-with-users.english: This remote vault is currently shared with the following people:
plugins.sync.label-sharing-with-users.chinese: 该远程仓库已共享给以下用户：

plugins.sync.label-not-sharing.english: This remote vault is not currently shared with anyone.

plugins.sync.label-leave-vault-confirmat.english: This will remove this vault from the list of vaults shared with you. This action cannot be reverted.
plugins.sync.label-leave-vault-confirmat.chinese: 这将把该仓库从共享给你的仓库中移除，这个操作是永久性的且不可逆的

plugins.sync.label-leave-vault-confirmat.english: Please contact the owner of the vault if you wish to collaborate on this vault again.
plugins.sync.label-leave-vault-confirmat.chinese: 如果你想重新加入仓库协作，请和仓库的拥有者联系

plugins.sync.label-require-subscription-.english: You need an Obsidian Sync subscription to connect to this vault.
plugins.sync.label-require-subscription-.chinese: 你需要购买 Obsidian 发布服务才能同步该仓库。

plugins.sync.option-contact-support-desc.english: If you run into any issues with Obsidian Sync, please contact us so we can help you out! You can reach us at support@obsidian.md.
plugins.sync.option-contact-support-desc.chinese: 如果你在使用 Obsidian 同步服务过程中遇到了任何问题，请联系我们。我们的联系方式是 support@obsidian.md 。

plugins.sync.label-sync-disconnected.english: Sync is not connected to a remote vault.
plugins.sync.label-sync-disconnected.chinese: 同步服务尚未连接至任何一个远程仓库。

plugins.sync.msg-remote-vault-limit-hit.english: You have created the maximum number of remote vaults. In order to create a new remote vault, please upgrade your account or remove an existing one.
plugins.sync.msg-remote-vault-limit-hit.chinese: Obsidian 同步服务允许你创建至多5个远程仓库。为了创建新的远程仓库，请先移除一个现有的远程仓库。

plugins.sync.label-upgrade-vault-encrypt.english: There is a new encryption version available for remote vaults.
plugins.sync.label-upgrade-vault-encrypt.chinese: 有新的加密版本可用于远程仓库。

plugins.sync.msg-recreate-remote-vault.english: This will delete your remote vault and recreate it with the latest encryption. Local files will not be affected, however your version history will be lost.
plugins.sync.msg-recreate-remote-vault.chinese: 这将删除你的远程仓库并重新创建一个使用最新加密版本的仓库。本地文件将不会受到影响，但版本历史将被删除。

plugins.sync.msg-migrate-pre-confirmatio.english: To upgrade your encryption, all data in the vault will be re-uploaded to the Obsidian Sync servers using the new encryption method. This process will permanently delete all data encrypted with the old encryption, including the version history for your vault.
plugins.sync.msg-migrate-pre-confirmatio.chinese: 为了升级加密，仓库中的所有数据将使用新加密方法重新上传到 Obsidian 同步服务器。此过程将永久删除所有使用旧加密方法加密的数据，包括仓库的版本历史。

plugins.sync.msg-migrate-pre-confirmatio.english: Important: we strongly recommend creating a backup of your vault before proceeding to prevent any potential data loss.
plugins.sync.msg-migrate-pre-confirmatio.chinese: 重要：我们强烈建议在继续之前创建仓库备份以防止任何潜在的数据丢失。

plugins.sync.msg-migrate-pre-confirmatio.english: After completing the upgrade, you will need to reconnect all your devices to the updated remote vault.
plugins.sync.msg-migrate-pre-confirmatio.chinese: 在完成升级后，您需要重新连接所有设备到更新后的远程仓库。

plugins.sync.msg-migrate-confirmation.english: Migrating your vault may take some time. You will need to keep Obsidian active on this device to re-upload all your notes and attachments. It is best to do this on your primary device.
plugins.sync.msg-migrate-confirmation.chinese: 迁移仓库可能需要一些时间。您需要在设备上保持 Obsidian 激活状态以重新上传所有笔记和附件。建议在主要设备上进行此操作。

plugins.sync.msg-migrate-confirmation-si.english: You have {{size}} of data. Migrating your vault may take some time. You will need to keep Obsidian active on this device to re-upload all your notes and attachments. It is best to do this on your primary device.
plugins.sync.msg-migrate-confirmation-si.chinese: 您有 {{size}} 的数据。迁移仓库可能需要一些时间。您需要在设备上保持 Obsidian 激活状态以重新上传所有笔记和附件。建议在主要设备上进行此操作。

plugins.file-recovery.desc.english: Restore recent snapshots to recover from accidental data loss. Snapshots are only saved for Markdown files.
plugins.file-recovery.desc.chinese: 通过最近的快照来恢复意外丢失的数据。仅为 Markdown 文件生成快照。

plugins.file-recovery.option-interval-de.english: Minimal interval in minutes between two snapshots.
plugins.file-recovery.option-interval-de.chinese: 设置快照的生成周期（分钟）。

plugins.file-recovery.option-keep-descri.english: Number of days the snapshots are kept for.
plugins.file-recovery.option-keep-descri.chinese: 设置快照的保存时长（天）

plugins.file-recovery.label-clear-warnin.english: Are you sure you want to delete all snapshots? Files inside your vault will not be affected.

interface.start-screen.mobile.label-sync.english: synced

interface.start-screen.mobile.label-star.english:
Obsidian stores notes on your device, so you can access them quickly and privately, even offline.
Your data is stored in a secure local folder called a **vault**.

interface.start-screen.mobile.label-sync.english: To access your notes on other devices you need to set up sync.

Because Obsidian stores your notes on your devices, you'll need to set up sync if you want to access your notes on another phone or computer.
You can set up sync now, or just start writing and set it up later.
Sync setup
Create a synced vault on your Obsidian account so that you can access your data from other devices.

interface.start-screen.mobile.option-enc.english: Offers the strongest security but requires you to safely store your encryption password
Uses a key managed by Obsidian to protect your data in transit and on our servers.

interface.start-screen.mobile.label-regi.english: Choose a server region near you to make syncing faster.

interface.start-screen.mobile.label-encr.english: This password cannot be changed later. If you forget your password, any remote data on Sync servers will be inaccessible forever.

interface.start-screen.mobile.label-remo.english: Your account **{{email}}** has existing vaults you can connect to.

interface.start-screen.mobile.label-sign.english: Sign in to your Obsidian account

interface.start-screen.mobile.msg-passwo.english: We have sent an email to {{email}} to reset your password.

interface.start-screen.mobile.label-sync.english: Choose how to sync your notes
To use Obsidian on your devices you will need to sync your data.
Seamless across every device and OS.
Secured with the strongest end-to-end encryption standard.
Requires an Obsidian account.

interface.start-screen.mobile.label-thir.english: May not be encrypted by default.

interface.start-screen.mobile.label-sync.english: Where is your vault located?
Other syncing methods

Obsidian officially supports two syncing methods: **Obsidian Sync** and **iCloud**.
However, because Obsidian gives you control over your data there are other sync options you can use.
These options include third-party plugins and other tools which may require more advanced set up.
To use an alternate syncing method, **create a vault** and follow the instructions provided by the plugin or third-party sync provider.

interface.start-screen.mobile.label-emai.english: Your email is required to create an Obsidian account.

interface.start-screen.mobile.email-veri.english: You should receive an email shortly to **{{email}}** with instructions to connect to Obsidian Sync.

interface.start-screen.mobile.icloud-mis.english: Your iCloud vault was not detected. This could be due to any of the following reasons:
Your vault is on a different iCloud account than the one you are currently signed into on this device.
Your vault is not stored on the top-level Obsidian folder of your iCloud Drive.

interface.start-screen.mobile.i-cloud-un.english: iCloud syncing is only available on Apple devices. If your vault is currently syncing via iCloud, learn how to migrate your vault to a different sync service.

interface.start-screen.mobile.msg-invali.english: Vault location must be a folder.

Changing this option requires a restart: 此选项更改需重启后方可生效。
Choose the languages for the spellchecke: 选择需要检查拼写的语言。
The native spellchecker will automatical: 本地的拼写检查器将自动检测你当前所使用的语言。
Displays the filename as an editable tit: 在笔记页面内显示笔记标题。
Limit maximum line length. Less content: 开启后将限制每行字数，使屏幕显示的内容减少，但使较长的段落更具可读性。
Markdown specs ignore single line breaks: 开启后，根据 Markdown 标准，单个换行符在预览模式下不再生效。
Choose how properties are displayed at t: 选择笔记属性在编辑器中的显示方式。选择 "源码" 可以以 YAML 格式显示笔记属性。
Auto-pair brackets: 自动补全英文标点符号
自动补全英文括号和引号。
Auto-pair Markdown syntax: 自动补全 Markdown 语法
Pair symbols automatically for bold, ita: 自动补全表示粗体和斜体的标记。
Automatically set indentation and place: 开启后 Obsidian 将根据换行和缩进情况自动调整列表符号。
Lets you fold all content under a headin: 开启后可以将正文内容折叠到标题行。
Lets you fold part of an indentation, su: 开启后可以将缩进内容（如列表）折叠起来。
The default view that a new Markdown tab: 设置新标签页的默认视图模式。
When you open a link in a new tab, switc: 当你在新标签页打开链接，立即切换至新标签页。
The default editing mode a new tab will: 在编辑视图下，新标签页默认采用的编辑模式。
Show vertical relationship lines between: 在缩进的行之间显示参考线。
Use tabs to indent by pressing the “Tab”: 开启后，Tab 键将使用制表符来完成缩进。关闭后 Tab 键将使用空格完成缩进。
Number of spaces a tab character will re: 设置制表符等同的空格数。
Sets the default text direction of notes: 将文本的默认水平对齐方式修改为右对齐。
Automatically convert HTML to Markdown w: 从网页粘贴或拖拽粘贴内容时自动将 HTML 格式转换为 Markdown 格式。如果不想转换，请使用 Ctrl/Cmd+Shift+V 进行粘贴。
允许在编辑器中使用 Vim 模式。
On mobile devices, this setting is per-d: 在移动设备上，该设置需要单独开启，且开启状态不会同步到其他移动设备上。
Rebuilding the cache could take a few se: 重建缓存可能需要几秒钟到几分钟的时间，具体取决于您的仓库大小。
Confirm entering Vim mode: 确认进入 Vim 模式
Vim mode is for efficient text editing b: Vim 模式可以实现高效的文本编辑操作，但其使用方法十分复杂。如果你对 Vim 不了解，开启该模式可能会让 Obsidian 难以使用。
